alert.note: Alert for Southwest Wyoming (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 04 at 3:32AM MST until March 05 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, locally up to 12 inches Ogden Valley and Park City. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In Utah, Wasatch Back. In Wyoming, Southwest Wyoming. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected, especially during the overnight hours.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx. For winter road conditions from the Wyoming Department of Transportation, visit http://www.wyoroad.info or dial 511.
